quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: Agostine dreams of making a beautiful dress, but needs the help of Lora Tay.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: Lora Tay asks for more information from Agostine.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: Agostine gives you bundles of fine cloth to show to Lora Tay.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: Lora Tay agrees to help Agostine, but she needs Silk Cocoons.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: Lora Tay need you for retrieve the design to Agostine.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: Lora Tay also needs Agostine's dress pattern.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: Lora Tay works on the dress. Wait outside before talking to Lora Tay again.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: Lora Tay says Agostine needs to finish the dress.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: Agostine needs Cotton Cloths to finish the dress.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: The Fine Dress is finished! Agostine can sell this magnificent dress to you for 20,000 GP.

quest.name: Agostine's Dream Dress
Agostine's Dream Dress
quest.text: The most beautiful dress in the world is yours! Congratz!
